metadata.titleCn: 黑河生态水文遥感试验：水文气象观测网数据集（下游四道桥超级站大孔径闪烁仪-2013）
metadata.description:
This dataset contains the flux measurements from the large aperture scintillometer (LAS) at Sidaoqiao Superstation (two sites) in the hydrometeorological observation network of Heihe River Basin. There were two types of LASs at site 1: German BLS900 and Netherlands Kipp&zonen. The north tower was set up with the BLS900/Kipp&zonen receiver, and the south tower was equipped with the BLS900/Kipp&zonen transmitter. The observation period of BLS900_1 and Kipp&zonen were from 11 July to 13 November, 2013, and 11 July to 12 September, 2013, respectively. There was one type of LAS at site 2: German BLS900. The north tower was set up with the BLS900 receiver, and the south tower was equipped with the BLS900 transmitter. BLS900_2 has been in use since 16 September, 2013. The Sidaoqiao Superstation (site1, north: 101.147° E, 42.005° N, south: 101.131° E, 41.987° N; site 2, north: 101.137° E, 42.008° N, south: 101.121° E, 41.990° N) was located in Ejinaqi, Inner Mongolia. The underlying surfaces between the two towers were tamarisk, populus, bare land and farmland. The elevation is 873 m. The effective height of the LASs was 25.5 m, and the path length of site 1 and site 2 were 2390 m and 2380 m, respectively. The data were sampled at 5 Hz and 1 Hz intervals for BLS900 and zzlas, respectively, and then averaged over 1 min.
The raw data acquired at 1 min intervals were processed and quality controlled. The data were subsequently averaged over 30 min periods, in which sensible heat flux was iteratively calculated by combining Cn2 with meteorological data according to the Monin-Obukhov similarity theory. The main quality control steps were as follows: (1) The data were rejected when Cn2 exceeded the saturated criterion (BLS900_1: Cn2>7.25E-14, Kipp&zonen: Cn2>7.84E-14, BLS900_2: Cn2>7.33E-14). (2) The data were rejected when the demodulation signal was small (BLS900: Average X Intensity<1000; Kipp&zonen: Demod>-20mv). (3) The data were rejected when collected during precipitation. (4) The data were rejected if collected at night when weak turbulence occurred (u* was less than 0.1 m/s). In the iteration process, the universal functions of Thiermann and Grassl, 1992 and Andreas, 1988 were selected for BLS900 and Kipp&zonen, respectively.
Several instructions were included with the released data. (1) The data of site 1 were primarily obtained from BLS900_1 measurements, and missing flux measurements from the BLS900_1 instrument were substituted with measurements from the Kipp&zonen instrument. The missing data were denoted by -6999. The data of site 2 were obtained from BLS900_2 measurements, missing data were denoted by -6999. Due to the problems of BLS900_1 transmitter, the data after 13 November, 2013, were not collected. (2) The dataset contained the following variables: data/time (yyyy-m-d h:mm), the structural parameter of the air refractive index (Cn2, m-2/3), and the sensible heat flux (H_LAS, W/m^2). In this dataset, a time of 0:30 corresponds to the average data for the period between 0:00 and 0:30, and the data were stored in *.xls format. Moreover, suspicious data were marked in red. 
For more information, please refer to Li et al. (2013) (for hydrometeorological observation network or sites information), Liu et al. (2011) (for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2013年7月11日至2013年12月31日的黑河水文气象观测网下游四道桥超级站的大孔径闪烁仪观测数据。下游四道桥超级站设有两组大孔径闪烁仪观测。东侧（1号点）有两台型号分别为BLS900和Kipp&zonen的大孔径闪烁仪，北塔为BLS900和Kipp&zonen的接收端，南塔为BLS900和Kipp&zonen的发射端。其中BLS900_1的观测时间为2013年7月11日至2013年11月13日，Kipp&zonen的观测时间为2013年7月11日至2013年9月12日。西侧（2号点）有一台型号为BLS900的大孔径闪烁仪，北塔为接收端，南塔为发射端，BLS900_2自2013年9月16日开始观测。站点位于内蒙古额济纳旗，下垫面是柽柳、胡杨、裸地和耕地等。1号点北塔的经纬度是101.147E，42.005N，南塔的经纬度是101.131E，41.987N；2号点北塔的经纬度是101.137E，42.008N，南塔的经纬度是101.121E，41.990N，海拔高度约为873m。大孔径闪烁仪的有效高度25.5m，1号点LAS光径路线长度是2390m，2号点LAS光径路线长度是2380m，BLS900型号闪烁仪采样频率是5Hz，Kipp&zonen型号闪烁仪采集频率是1Hz，平均为1min输出。
大孔径闪烁仪原始观测数据为1min，发布的数据为经过处理与质量控制的30分钟数据，其中感热通量主要是结合自动气象站观测数据，基于莫宁-奥布霍夫相似理论通过迭代计算得到，主要的质量控制步骤包括：（1）剔除Cn2达到饱和的数据（BLS900_1：Cn2 >7.25E-14，Kipp&zonen：Cn2 >7.84 E-14，BLS900_2：Cn2 >7.33 E-14）；（2）剔除解调信号强度较弱的数据（BLS900：Average X Intensity<1000，Kipp&zonen：Demod>-20mv）；（3）剔除降水时刻的数据；（4）剔除稳定条件下的弱湍流的数据（u*小于0.1m/s）。在迭代计算过程中，对于BLS900，选取Thiermann and Grassl, 1992的稳定度普适函数；对于Kipp&zonen，选取Andreas, 1988的稳定度普适函数。
关于发布数据的几点说明：（1）下游1号点LAS数据以BLS900_1为主，缺失时刻由Kipp&zonen观测补充，两者都缺失时则以-6999标记；下游2号点LAS数据以BLS900_2为主，缺失时刻由-6999标记；BLS900_1在11月13日后发射端出现问题，此后数据缺失；（2）数据表头：Date/Time ：日期/时间（格式：yyyy-m-d h:mm），Cn2 ：空气折射指数结构参数（单位：m-2/3），H_LAS ：感热通量（单位：W/m2）。数据时间的含义，如0:30代表0:00-0:30的平均；数据以*.xls格式存储。
水文气象网或站点信息请参考Li et al. (2013)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al.(2011)。

background: The two-source energy balance (TSEB) model was successfully applied to estimate evaporation (E), transpiration (T), and evapotranspiration (ET) for land covered with vegetation, which has significantly important applications for the terrestrial water cycle and water resource management. One-source evapotranspiration estimation models combine the soil–vegetation components into a single source. However, in real landscape conditions, the surface is heterogeneous and contains a mixture of soil and vegetation having different temperatures and resistance to energy exchange. Therefore, one-source models explicitly cannot estimate the surface evapotranspiration accurately because the effect of.

Shuttleworth and Wallace proposed a typical two-source evapotranspiration estimation model in which the energy partition is assumed to occur in both “the above canopy” and “the under soil” cases. Water vapor and heat meet over the reference height in the interior of the canopy. Moreover, the mixed water vapor and heat can only exit through the top of the canopy; the total heat flux is in addition to the fluxes coming from every surface layer. However, the model is complex, having over five resistances that cannot be accurately calculated. In addition, the model includes required parameters and observations that cannot be readily obtained from operational satellite- and ground-based data; therefore, the range of applications of the model is limited.

The TSEB model has undergone several revisions, improving the estimation of soil and canopy net radiation, the aerodynamic resistance of the soil surface, the fractional vegetation coverage observed at the radiometer view angle, the distribution of regional-scale near-surface air temperature, and soil and canopy component temperatures. Because the TSEB model only requires the surface energy balance model with a single measurement of land surface temperature, the original model and subsequent refinements have been widely used to estimate E and T under a wide variety of vegetation types, vegetation coverage, climates, and spatial scales. However, most studies have only evaluated the total fluxes or ET (soil plus canopy) in comparison with measurements using the Bowen ratio–energy balance system, the eddy covariance (EC) system, or the large aperture scintillometer.

Accurately estimating surface fluxes in a strongly advective irrigated agricultural area is a particularly challenging task and is even more difficult when the EC flux measurements of H and LE have an incomplete energy balance closure with respect to the available energy Rn−G0. The previous sensitivity studies found that the TSEB model performance is mainly affected by the uncertainty in surface–air temperature difference. Sometimes, this difference is dominant due to the errors in determining the surface soil and vegetation component temperatures from the surface composite radiometric temperature. In this letter, it is shown that there is an overestimation of the component temperatures compared with the observed composite radiometric. This often leads to the most crucial effect on the TSEB model performance. In addition, another factor is the strong advective environment in this region.
research objective: In this letter, the ground-measured soil and canopy component temperatures were used to estimate E, T, and ET, which were better validated with observed ratios of E (E/ET%) and T (T/ET%) using the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotopes, and the ET measurements using an eddy covariance (EC) system.

The objective of this letter is to estimate E, T, and ET using the soil and canopy component temperatures observed via a high-resolution thermal camera as inputs to a series TSEB model and to subsequently better validate E, T, and ET using a combination of the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotope technique and EC measurements.
challenges: However, the current composite temperature separation approaches are limited in their effectiveness in arid regions. Moreover, E and T are difficult to measure on the ground.

Errors in the derived component temperature were primarily caused by image classification errors; these classification errors varied with vegetation abundance. The higher uncertainty of H estimation is not only caused by the uncertainty of the TSEB model but also due to the increased uncertainty of the EC system, which is 18% when the mean H is small in the irrigated farmland. Due to image pixel classification errors, soil pixels were counted as vegetation pixels, which produced an overestimation of the canopy temperature under the developing vegetation abundance. Alternatively, ignoring atmospheric upwelling radiation and transmittance could have produced the uncertainties in the estimated temperatures. In addition, the estimated uncertainty of the incoming short- and long-wave radiation transmittances through the canopy may be another source of Rn estimation errors.
methods: In this letter, the field observations were obtained from the Daman superstation installed in the central oasis, which is a 40-m boundary layer tower located at 100.3722° E, 38.8555° N and at an elevation of 1556 m. The meteorological parameters were measured every 10 min and included air temperature, wind speed, humidity at 5 m over the ground, four-component radiations (measured at 12 m above the ground using a four-component radiometer), and turbulent fluxes (measured at 4.5 m above the ground using an EC system with a sampling frequency of 10 Hz). The soil heat fluxes were measured using three heat plates located 6 cm under the ground. A Fluke Ti55 thermal infrared camera was manually operated on a 25-m-high platform on a boundary layer tower to measure the thermal radiation of the cropland approximately every 120 min; the observations were collected as thermal images from approximately 07:00 to 19:00 China Standard Time (CST) during the daytime. The ground-based measurement data were applied to partition ET into E and T applying the Craig–Gordon model.

To evaluate the TSEB model accurately, the soil heat flux was using the ground measurement. In addition, the soil and canopy sensible heat fluxes were estimated using the series TSEB model, and their latent heat fluxes were calculated while solving the energy balance equations (1) and (2), respectively. The soil and canopy component temperatures were calculated using the images obtained with the thermal camera. To calculate the component temperatures, the visible and NIR images were classified into soil and canopy pixels using the maximum-likelihood method. Next, the soil and canopy directional brightness temperatures were exacted from the thermal images. Finally, the thermal infrared temperatures were converted to the radiation temperatures using the incoming long-wave radiation from the sky and the soil and canopy emissivities. Next, the simulated radiometric temperatures were validated against the surface radiometric temperatures, which were calculated according to the incoming long-wave radiation observed by the four-component radiometer.
dataset: The experimental area is an artificial oasis that is covered with maize, vegetables, and orchards. Data of day of year (DOY) 170, 173, 176, 192, 195, 231, 252, and 256 were used to determine ET and the ratios of E (E/ET%) and T (T/ET%) to ET during the Multi-Scale Observation Experiment on Evapotranspiration over heterogeneous land surfaces, which was part of the Heihe Water Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (HiWATER-MUSOEXE).
findings: Our results indicated that even under the strongly advective conditions, the TSEB model produced reliable estimates of the E/ET% and T/ET% ratios and of ET. The mean bias and root-mean-square error (RMSE) of E/ET% were 1% and 2%, respectively, and the mean bias and RMSE of T/ET% were −1% and 2%, respectively. In addition, the model exhibited relatively reliable estimates in the latent heat flux, with mean bias and RMSE values of 31 and 61 W·m−2, respectively, compared with the measurements from the EC system. These results demonstrated that a robust soil and vegetation component temperature calculation was crucial for estimating E, T, and ET. Moreover, the separate validation of E/ET% and T/ET% provides a good prospect for TSEB model improvements.

Our results demonstrated that the TSEB model using soil and canopy component radiometric temperatures, which were obtained from a high-precision thermal infrared camera, can be applied in a strongly advection-irrigated agricultural area. Notably, the results illustrated that the latent fluxes of the soil and vegetation components were successfully separated with reasonable accuracy, as assessed using ground-based measurements. The estimated E/ET% and E/ET% values agreed well with the values observed using the stable oxygen and hydrogen isotopes technique during the early, middle, and late growing seasons. In addition, the TSEB model produced reliable estimations of Rn, H, and LE; the mean biases of Rn, H, and LE were −18, 5, and 31 W ·m−2, respectively, and the RMSEs of Rn, H, and LE were 29, 19, and 61 W · m−2, respectively. This finding suggests that given accurate soil and vegetation component temperatures, E and T can be accurately separated from ET using the TSEB model.
backgroundCn: 双源能量平衡（TSEB）模型成功应用于估算植被覆盖土地的蒸发（E）、蒸腾（T）和蒸散（ET），这对陆地水循环和水资源管理具有重要意义。单源蒸散估算模型将土壤-植被组件合并为一个单一源。然而，在真实的景观条件下，表面是异质的，包含具有不同温度和能量交换阻力的土壤和植被的混合物。因此，单源模型显然无法准确估算表面蒸散，因为其影响。

Shuttleworth和Wallace提出了一种典型的双源蒸散发估算模型，该模型假设能量分配发生在“树冠上方”和“土壤下方”两种情况。水蒸气和热量在树冠内部的参考高度相遇。此外，混合的水蒸气和热量只能通过树冠顶部排出；总热通量是除了来自每个表层的通量之外的额外通量。然而，该模型复杂，具有超过五个无法准确计算的阻力。此外，该模型还包括一些所需的参数和观测，这些参数和观测无法从操作卫星和地面数据中轻易获得；因此，该模型的应用范围受到限制。

TSEB模型经过多次修订，改善了土壤和冠层净辐射的估算、土壤表面的气动阻力、在辐射计视角下观察到的植被覆盖度、区域尺度近地面气温的分布以及土壤和冠层组分的温度。由于TSEB模型只需要一个地表温度的单一测量来进行表面能量平衡模型的计算，因此原始模型及其后续改进已被广泛用于在各种植被类型、植被覆盖、气候和空间尺度下估算蒸散发（E）和温度（T）。然而，大多数研究仅评估了总通量或蒸散发（土壤加冠层）与使用波恩比-能量平衡系统、涡度协方差（EC）系统或大孔径闪烁仪的测量结果的比较。

在强烈的平流灌溉农业区域，准确估计表面通量是一项特别具有挑战性的任务，当EC通量测量的H和LE与可用能量Rn−G0之间存在能量平衡闭合不完整时，这一任务变得更加困难。之前的敏感性研究发现，TSEB模型的性能主要受到表面-空气温差不确定性的影响。有时，这种温差由于从表面复合辐射温度中确定表面土壤和植被组分温度的误差而占主导地位。本文显示，与观察到的复合辐射温度相比，组分温度存在过高估计。这通常对TSEB模型的性能产生最关键的影响。此外，该区域的强平流环境也是另一个因素。
research objectiveCn: 在这封信中，地面测量的土壤和冠层成分温度被用来估算蒸散（E）、蒸发（T）和蒸散发（ET），这些估算通过稳定的氧和氢同位素以及使用涡度协方差（EC）系统的ET测量结果进行了更好的验证，得到了E（E/ET%）和T（T/ET%）的观察比率。
这封信的目的是利用高分辨率热像仪观察到的土壤和冠层组件温度作为输入，通过一系列TSEB模型来估算蒸散发（E）、土壤温度（T）和蒸散发总量（ET），并随后结合稳定氧和氢同位素技术以及涡动相关（EC）测量，更好地验证E、T和ET。
challengesCn: 然而，目前的复合温度分离方法在干旱地区的有效性有限。此外，E和T在地面上难以测量。

导出组件温度的误差主要是由于图像分类错误引起的；这些分类错误随着植被丰度的变化而变化。H估计的不确定性不仅是由于TSEB模型的不确定性，还由于EC系统的不确定性，当灌溉农田的平均H较小时，这种不确定性为18%。由于图像像素分类错误，土壤像素被错误地计为植被像素，这导致在植被丰度发展的情况下，冠层温度被高估。另一方面，忽略大气向上辐射和透射率可能导致估计温度的不确定性。此外，估计的通过冠层的短波和长波辐射透射率的不确定性可能是Rn估计误差的另一个来源。
methodsCn: 在这封信中，现场观测数据来自于安装在中央绿洲的达曼超级站，该站是一座40米高的边界层塔，位于东经100.3722°，北纬38.8555°，海拔1556米。气象参数每10分钟测量一次，包括地面5米处的气温、风速和湿度，12米高处使用四分量辐射计测量的四分量辐射，以及使用10 Hz采样频率的EC系统在4.5米高处测量的湍流通量。土壤热通量通过位于地下6厘米的三个热板进行测量。一台Fluke Ti55热红外相机在边界层塔的25米高平台上手动操作，约每120分钟测量一次农田的热辐射；观测数据在中国标准时间（CST）白天的07:00至19:00期间收集为热图像。基于地面测量数据，应用Craig-Gordon模型将蒸散发（ET）分解为蒸发（E）和蒸腾（T）。

为了准确评估TSEB模型，土壤热通量使用地面测量数据。此外，土壤和冠层的感热通量是通过系列TSEB模型估算的，而它们的潜热通量则通过求解能量平衡方程（1）和（2）计算得出。土壤和冠层的组件温度是使用热像仪获得的图像计算的。为了计算组件温度，使用最大似然法将可见光和近红外图像分类为土壤和冠层像素。接下来，从热图像中提取土壤和冠层的方向亮温。最后，利用来自天空的入射长波辐射和土壤及冠层的发射率，将热红外温度转换为辐射温度。最后，模拟的辐射温度与根据四分量辐射计观测的入射长波辐射计算的表面辐射温度进行了验证。
datasetCn: 实验区域是一个人工绿洲，种植有玉米、蔬菜和果园。使用了第170、173、176、192、195、231、252和256天的数据来确定蒸散发（ET）以及蒸发（E/ET%）和蒸腾（T/ET%）相对于ET的比率，这些研究是在多尺度蒸散发观测实验中进行的，属于黑河水联合遥测实验研究（HiWATER-MUSOEXE）的一部分。
findingsCn: 我们的结果表明，即使在强烈的对流条件下，TSEB模型仍然能够可靠地估计E/ET%和T/ET%比率以及ET。E/ET%的平均偏差和均方根误差（RMSE）分别为1%和2%；而T/ET%的平均偏差和RMSE分别为−1%和2%。此外，该模型在潜热通量的估计上也表现出相对可靠的结果，与EC系统的测量值相比，平均偏差和RMSE值分别为31和61 W·m−2。这些结果表明，稳健的土壤和植被组分温度计算对于估计E、T和ET至关重要。此外，E/ET%和T/ET%的单独验证为TSEB模型的改进提供了良好的前景。

我们的结果表明，使用高精度热红外相机获得的土壤和冠层组件辐射温度的TSEB模型可以应用于强烈的平流灌溉农业区域。值得注意的是，结果表明土壤和植被组件的潜在通量成功地以合理的精度分离，经过地面测量的评估。估计的E/ET%和E/ET%值与在早期、中期和晚期生长季节使用稳定氧和氢同位素技术观察到的值非常一致。此外，TSEB模型对Rn、H和LE的估计也很可靠；Rn、H和LE的平均偏差分别为−18、5和31 W·m−2，Rn、H和LE的均方根误差（RMSE）分别为29、19和61 W·m−2。这一发现表明，给定准确的土壤和植被组件温度，E和T可以通过TSEB模型准确地从ET中分离出来。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其发生在发展中国家（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是经济发展的基础，特别是在中国西部，自古以来就是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持了中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠地区被先前的研究者发现是碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展是非常重要的。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解，对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用、保护生态稳定性和促进绿洲的社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频发，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（赵等，2013）、咸海流域（Stanev等，2004；Crétaux等，2009）和乌尔米湖流域（Stone，2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们呈现了一套来自人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统的观测数据集，涵盖了2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据是通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取的。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度，风速和风向的梯度；空气压力、降水和土壤湿度剖面）是通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期观测的，同时也包括地下水位数据。此外，植被和土壤参数也被补充到数据集中。数据处理和质量控制程序可以分为数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括位于中国西部干旱地区的HRB中下游，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了11个地表通量和气象站，包括2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Example.AnswerCn: 来自绿洲-沙漠系统的数据集包括能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量的长期观测，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。这些数据集的结构包括通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取的半小时湍流通量数据，以及以10分钟平均周期观测的水文气象数据。

Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 大型孔径闪烁仪在水文气象观测网络中测量的具体属性包括哪些？

Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在水文气象数据集的数据处理过程中，质量控制需要考虑哪些因素？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'stable oxygen and hydrogen isotopes' in validating evapotranspiration measurements?
Definition.QuestionCn: “稳定的氧和氢同位素”在验证蒸散发测量中的意思是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Stable oxygen and hydrogen isotopes refer to non-radioactive forms of these elements that are used to trace and validate components of evapotranspiration processes. By analyzing the isotopic composition of water, researchers can distinguish between evaporation and transpiration contributions to overall water fluxes.
Definition.AnswerCn: 稳定的氧和氢同位素指的是这些元素的非放射性形式，常用于追踪和验证蒸散发过程的组成。通过分析水的同位素组成，研究人员可以区分蒸发和植物蒸腾对整体水通量的贡献。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the challenges of estimating evapotranspiration using the TSEB model differ from those encountered when measuring energy and water vapor exchanges in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用TSEB模型估算蒸散发所面临的挑战与在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中测量能量和水汽交换时遇到的挑战有何不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The challenges of estimating evapotranspiration using the TSEB model include difficulties with component temperature separation and achieving accurate soil and canopy temperature estimations, especially in arid regions. In contrast, measuring energy and water vapor exchanges in oasis–desert ecosystems involves addressing environmental degradation threats, such as drying rivers and land desertification, and requires long-term datasets to understand ecological interactions and stability. Both approaches face unique environmental and technical challenges that influence data accuracy and applicability.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 使用TSEB模型估算蒸散发的挑战包括组件温度分离的困难以及在干旱地区实现准确的土壤和冠层温度估计。相比之下，测量绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量和水汽交换涉及应对环境退化威胁，如河流干涸和土地沙漠化，并且需要长期数据集以理解生态相互作用和稳定性。这两种方法都面临独特的环境和技术挑战，这些挑战影响数据的准确性和适用性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges in accurately estimating surface fluxes in strongly advective irrigated agricultural areas?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在强对流灌溉农业区域，准确估计表面通量面临的挑战因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Accurately estimating surface fluxes in strongly advective irrigated agricultural areas is challenging due to the uncertainty in surface–air temperature differences, which is often caused by errors in determining the surface soil and vegetation component temperatures from the surface composite radiometric temperature. Additionally, the strong advective environment in these regions further complicates the estimation.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在强烈的平流灌溉农业区域，准确估计表面通量是具有挑战性的，这主要是由于表面与空气温度差异的不确定性，这种不确定性通常是由于从表面复合辐射温度中确定表面土壤和植被组分温度时出现的误差。此外，这些地区强烈的平流环境进一步加大了估计的复杂性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the causes behind the limitations of current composite temperature separation approaches in arid regions?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 当前复合温度分离方法在干旱地区的局限性原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The limitations of current composite temperature separation approaches in arid regions are primarily due to image classification errors, which vary with vegetation abundance. These errors can lead to overestimation of canopy temperature under developing vegetation abundance, and ignoring atmospheric upwelling radiation and transmittance can also introduce uncertainties in estimated temperatures.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 当前在干旱地区的复合温度分离方法的局限性主要源于图像分类错误，这些错误随着植被丰度的变化而变化。在植被丰度较低的情况下，这些错误可能导致对冠层温度的高估。此外，忽视大气向上辐射和透射率也可能在温度估算中引入不确定性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in arid and semi-arid regions?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么在干旱和半干旱地区维持绿洲和沙漠系统之间的平衡至关重要？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Maintaining the balance between oasis and desert systems is critical to sustainable development because it supports the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases. Oases are crucial for ecological security and achieving carbon peaking and carbon neutrality goals, as they play a significant role in the carbon balance and promote sustainable development.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对可持续发展至关重要，因为这支持了绿洲的生态稳定性和社会经济发展。绿洲对生态安全和实现碳达峰、碳中和目标至关重要，因为它们在碳平衡中发挥着重要作用，并促进可持续发展。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential effects on data quality when using multiple scintillometers with differing sampling frequencies for hydrometeorological observations?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用不同采样频率的多个闪烁计进行水文气象观测时，对数据质量的潜在影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using multiple scintillometers with different sampling frequencies can lead to varying temporal resolutions in the data, which might introduce discrepancies in the observed parameters. The integration of data from instruments like BLS900 and Kipp&zonen, with sampling frequencies of 5Hz and 1Hz respectively, requires careful processing to ensure consistent and reliable data quality, especially when averaging to a unified time resolution such as 30 minutes.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用不同采样频率的多个闪烁计可能导致数据的时间分辨率不同，从而引入观察参数的差异。将BLS900和Kipp&zonen等仪器的数据进行整合时，采样频率分别为5Hz和1Hz，需要仔细处理，以确保数据质量的一致性和可靠性，特别是在平均到统一的时间分辨率（如30分钟）时。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences of long-term data collection on understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 长期数据收集对理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水蒸气和碳交换的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Long-term data collection enhances the understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems by providing comprehensive datasets that capture seasonal and interannual variations. This sustained observation is crucial for recognizing the interactions within these ecosystems, supporting ecological stability, and aiding in sustainable development efforts by offering insights into the impacts of climate change and human activities over extended periods.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 长期数据收集增强了对绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的理解，通过提供全面的数据集来捕捉季节性和年际变化。这种持续的观察对于识别这些生态系统内的相互作用至关重要，支持生态稳定，并通过提供对气候变化和人类活动在较长时期内影响的洞察，帮助可持续发展努力。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to collect data on the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集关于绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据为何重要？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is critical to achieving carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in these areas. It supports ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis and is crucial for recognizing oasis–desert interactions and protecting ecological stability and socioeconomic development.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现这些地区的碳达峰和碳中和至关重要。这有助于绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展，并对认识绿洲-沙漠相互作用、保护生态稳定和社会经济发展具有重要意义。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the goal of maintaining long-term observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 维护人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的长期观测数据集的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal is to provide a comprehensive understanding of energy, water vapor, carbon, and methane fluxes, as well as auxiliary hydrometeorological, vegetation, and soil parameters. This long-term data helps in assessing the interactions between oasis and desert systems, which is significant for sustainable oasis development and ecological stability.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是提供对能量、水汽、碳和甲烷通量的全面理解，以及辅助的水文气象、植被和土壤参数。这些长期数据有助于评估绿洲与沙漠系统之间的相互作用，这对可持续的绿洲发展和生态稳定具有重要意义。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the essential steps involved in processing and quality controlling data collected from a large aperture scintillometer in hydrometeorological networks?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在水文气象网络中处理和质量控制从大孔径闪烁仪收集的数据所涉及的基本步骤是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The data is processed and quality controlled by removing saturated data (Cn2 exceeding specific thresholds), weak signal data (based on intensity and demodulation thresholds), data collected during precipitation, and data under stable conditions with weak turbulence. Observations are combined with automatic weather station data and calculated using the Monin-Obukhov similarity theory. Specific universal functions are applied based on the instrument model.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 数据经过处理和质量控制，去除了饱和数据（Cn2 超过特定阈值）、弱信号数据（基于强度和解调阈值）、降水期间收集的数据，以及在稳定条件下具有弱湍流的数据。观测数据与自动气象站数据相结合，并使用 Monin-Obukhov 相似理论进行计算。根据仪器模型应用特定的通用函数。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can eddy covariance systems be utilized to accurately partition evapotranspiration in oasis-desert ecosystems, and what are the procedural considerations?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 涡度协方差系统如何用于准确划分绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的蒸散量，以及有哪些程序上的注意事项？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Eddy covariance systems are used to measure turbulent fluxes, which are then partitioned into evaporation and transpiration using observed soil and canopy temperatures. This involves obtaining thermal images, classifying them into soil and canopy pixels, and converting them into radiometric temperatures. The integration of stable oxygen and hydrogen isotope techniques helps validate the partitioning.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统用于测量湍流通量，然后利用观测到的土壤和树冠温度将其划分为蒸发和蒸腾。这涉及获取热成像，将其分类为土壤和树冠像素，并转换为辐射温度。稳定氧和氢同位素技术的结合有助于验证这一划分。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements enabled the use of large aperture scintillometers for hydrometeorological data collection in arid regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步使得在干旱地区使用大孔径闪烁仪进行水文气象数据收集成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The large aperture scintillometer models like BLS900 and Kipp&zonen, with specific configurations for transmitting and receiving, enabled detailed data collection on air refractive index structure parameters and heat fluxes. These instruments can handle high-frequency data sampling and apply quality control measures effectively in the challenging conditions of arid regions.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 大型孔径闪烁仪模型如BLS900和Kipp&Zonen，具有特定的发射和接收配置，能够对空气折射率结构参数和热通量进行详细的数据收集。这些仪器能够处理高频数据采样，并在干旱地区的恶劣条件下有效地应用质量控制措施。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the integration of stable isotope techniques and eddy covariance systems enable more accurate estimations of evapotranspiration components in complex ecosystems?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 稳定同位素技术与涡度协方差系统的结合如何使复杂生态系统中蒸散发成分的估算更加准确？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The stable isotope techniques combined with eddy covariance systems provide a robust framework for validating evapotranspiration estimations by separating the soil and canopy component temperatures. This integration allows precise measurement of evaporation and transpiration ratios, improving the accuracy of the TSEB model in estimating surface fluxes.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 稳定同位素技术与涡度协方差系统相结合，为验证蒸散发估算提供了一个稳健的框架，通过分离土壤和冠层的温度。这种整合允许精确测量蒸发和蒸腾比，提高了TSEB模型在估算表面通量方面的准确性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: In what ways do long-term observational datasets enhance the understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 长期观测数据集在增强对绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的理解方面有哪些作用？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Long-term observational datasets from multiple land surface flux and meteorological stations provide comprehensive data on fluxes, hydrometeorological conditions, and vegetation and soil parameters. This extensive data collection enables a quantitative understanding of oasis–desert interactions and supports ecological stability and sustainable development efforts by offering insights into the dynamics of these exchanges over time.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 来自多个陆面通量和气象站的长期观测数据集提供了关于通量、水文气象条件以及植被和土壤参数的全面数据。这种广泛的数据收集使我们能够定量理解绿洲与沙漠之间的相互作用，并通过提供对这些交换动态的时间洞察，支持生态稳定性和可持续发展努力。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the data collection of evaporation, transpiration, and evapotranspiration in vegetation-covered land require different approaches than those for non-vegetated surfaces?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么在植被覆盖的土地上收集蒸发、蒸腾和蒸散的数据需要与非植被表面不同的方法？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The data collection for evaporation, transpiration, and evapotranspiration in vegetation-covered land requires different approaches because the surface is heterogeneous, containing a mixture of soil and vegetation with varying temperatures and resistance to energy exchange. One-source models cannot accurately estimate surface evapotranspiration due to these differences, necessitating more complex models like the two-source energy balance (TSEB) model, which accounts for the energy partition in both the above canopy and under soil cases.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在植被覆盖的土地上，蒸发、蒸腾和蒸散的数据显示需要不同的方法，因为表面是异质的，包含土壤和植被的混合物，具有不同的温度和能量交换的阻力。单源模型无法准确估计表面蒸散，因为这些差异，因此需要更复杂的模型，如双源能量平衡（TSEB）模型，该模型考虑了冠层上方和土壤下方的能量分配。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might long-term observations be crucial for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 长期观测对于理解绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换至关重要的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Long-term observations are crucial for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas because they provide a quantitative understanding of the oasis–desert interactions, which is significant for maintaining ecological stability and supporting sustainable development. These observations help recognize the fundamental characteristics of these exchanges and are vital for achieving carbon peaking and carbon neutrality goals, especially in regions facing ecological degradation such as river drying and land desertification.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 长期观测对于理解绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换至关重要，因为它们提供了对绿洲-沙漠相互作用的定量理解，这对维持生态稳定和支持可持续发展具有重要意义。这些观测有助于识别这些交换的基本特征，并且对于实现碳达峰和碳中和目标至关重要，特别是在面临生态退化的地区，如河流干涸和土地沙漠化。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How do you evaluate the effectiveness of the data collection methods used for measuring energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估用于测量绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据收集方法的有效性？

The use of an eddy covariance system and scintillometer provides reliable half-hourly turbulent flux data, which is crucial for understanding the interactions within oasis–desert ecosystems.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法可能是有效的，因为全面使用了长期观测数据集，包括能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪提供可靠的半小时湍流通量数据，这对于理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统内的相互作用至关重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges in acquiring accurate data from large aperture scintillometers for hydrometeorological studies?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在水文气象研究中，从大孔径闪烁仪获取准确数据的潜在挑战是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Challenges in acquiring accurate data from large aperture scintillometers may include issues related to data saturation, weak demodulation signal strength, and external influences such as precipitation, which necessitate rigorous quality control measures. Additionally, the environmental conditions, such as atmospheric stability and the presence of advective environments, can introduce complexities in data interpretation and require careful calibration and validation against ground-based measurements.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 从大孔径闪烁仪获取准确数据的挑战可能包括数据饱和、解调信号强度弱以及降水等外部影响，这需要严格的质量控制措施。此外，环境条件，如大气稳定性和存在的平流环境，可能会给数据解释带来复杂性，需要与地面测量进行仔细的校准和验证。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How might the existing datasets on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange be expanded or refined to provide more robust insights into oasis–desert systems?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 现有的关于能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据集如何扩展或精炼，以提供对绿洲-沙漠系统更为可靠的洞察？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Existing datasets can be expanded or refined by incorporating additional parameters such as stable isotope data for better validation of evapotranspiration estimates, increasing the spatial and temporal resolution of data collection, and integrating advanced remote sensing technologies. Furthermore, enhancing cross-comparisons between different measurement systems, such as eddy covariance and scintillometers, can improve the robustness and comprehensiveness of the datasets.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 现有数据集可以通过纳入额外参数（如稳定同位素数据）来扩展或精炼，以更好地验证蒸散发估算，增加数据收集的空间和时间分辨率，并整合先进的遥感技术。此外，加强不同测量系统（如涡度协方差法和闪烁仪）之间的交叉比较，可以提高数据集的稳健性和全面性。

Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中测量能量、水蒸气和碳通量所面临的挑战感到不确定。

Assertion.AnswerEn: Data collection methods involve using eddy covariance systems and scintillometers for turbulent fluxes, automatic weather stations for hydrometeorological data, and supplementary data on vegetation and soil parameters. These methods are tailored to capture a wide range of environmental variables essential for studying arid regions.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法包括使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪测量湍流通量，自动气象站收集水文气象数据，以及补充的植被和土壤参数数据。这些方法旨在捕捉对研究干旱地区至关重要的广泛环境变量。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore the methodologies used in collecting hydrometeorological and energy flux data in oasis–desert ecosystems and their implications for data accuracy and reliability.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中收集水文气象和能量通量数据的方法及其对数据准确性和可靠性的影响。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The methodologies involve using an eddy covariance system and scintillometer for turbulent flux data, including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes. Auxiliary hydrometeorological data such as radiation, soil heat flux, soil temperature profiles, air temperature and humidity gradients, wind speed and direction, air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles are recorded by automatic weather stations. Data processing includes quality control measures to ensure reliability.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 这些方法涉及使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取湍流通量数据，包括能量、水蒸气和碳通量。辅助的水文气象数据如辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面、空气温度和湿度梯度、风速和风向、气压、降水和土壤湿度剖面由自动气象站记录。数据处理包括质量控制措施，以确保数据的可靠性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the challenges encountered in accurately estimating evapotranspiration in arid regions and potential strategies to overcome these challenges.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 分析在干旱地区准确估算蒸散发所遇到的挑战以及克服这些挑战的潜在策略。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges include the effectiveness of composite temperature separation approaches and errors in deriving component temperatures due to image classification errors, particularly in areas with varying vegetation abundance. Strategies to overcome these challenges involve using ground-measured soil and canopy component temperatures, stable isotope techniques, and the TSEB model to improve accuracy.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 挑战包括复合温度分离方法的有效性以及由于图像分类错误导致的成分温度推导误差，特别是在植被丰度变化的区域。克服这些挑战的策略包括使用地面测量的土壤和树冠成分温度、稳定同位素技术以及TSEB模型来提高准确性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please investigate the potential datasets available for studying energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas and their significance for ecological sustainability.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请调查可用于研究绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的潜在数据集及其对生态可持续性的意义。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Potential datasets include long-term observations from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems, capturing energy, water vapor, carbon, and methane fluxes from 2012 to 2021. These datasets are significant for understanding oasis–desert interactions, supporting ecological security, and sustainable socio-economic development.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 潜在的数据集包括来自人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统的长期观测，捕捉2012年至2021年的能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量。这些数据集对于理解绿洲–沙漠相互作用、支持生态安全和可持续社会经济发展具有重要意义。
